title: Sexy Girls Wallpapers
description:
Loved by one million users worldwide. Enjoy hot girls backgrounds HD and free hot photos album for smartphone! Hot pics of bikini girls and hot actress are updated daily!
Over 10000 hot models and asian beautiful girls pictures are contained!
Hot girls backgrounds include partly chinese, japanese and korean pretty women in swimsuits on beaches.
All sexy women and hot models are over 18 years old.

New Features
- High quality and resolution images.
- Cute sexy babe in other regions are provided.
- My Favorite that collect the beauty of hot girls pics into apps has been implemented.
- Fast download.
- Saving hot images of pretty girls into SD card or device for home screen.
- Lock screen compatible.
- Hot bikini girls collection ranking of hot pics.
- Hottest girls in monthly top.
- The latest sexy women every time.
- Sexiest women wearing swimwear in the category of weekly.
- Cool wallpapers of sexy ladies for android phone and tablet.
- Notification ON/OFF setting in menu.
- Auto play mode.
